description: This file is a shell script that manages the lifecycle of a DHCPv6 server service, including configuration generation, starting, stopping, and handling relevant network events.

methods.name: prepare_dhcpv6s_config
methods.description: Generates the DHCPv6 server configuration file based on current system settings and environment variables.

methods.name: restore_dhcpv6s_duid
methods.description: Restores the DHCPv6 Server's DUID (interface identifier) from saved system data or NVRAM.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes service variables by fetching configuration from system and environment.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the DHCPv6 server, ensuring dependencies are met and configuration is prepared.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the DHCPv6 server and saves necessary data for future restarts.
